body: Let's see how many conflicts this has :sweat_smile:

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23508](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23508) (Add getdeploymentinfo RPC by ajtowns)
* [#23507](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23507) (Refactor: Improve API design of `ScriptToUniv`, `TxToUniv` etc to return the `UniValue` instead of mutating a parameter/reference by mjdietzx)
* [#23486](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23486) (rpc: Only allow specific types to be P2(W)SH wrapped in decodescript by MarcoFalke)
* [#23465](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23465) (Remove CTxMemPool params from ATMP by lsilva01)
* [#23437](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23437) (refactor, mempool: refactor AcceptToMemoryPool by lsilva01)
* [#23373](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23373) (Parse command line arguments from unit and fuzz tests, make addrman consistency check ratio easier to change by vasild)
* [#23367](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23367) (Optimize coin selection by dropping BnB upper limit by S3RK)
* [#23330](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23330) (WIP: [RPC] allow fetching headers by pages by JeremyRubin)
* [#23320](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23320) (rpc: Add RPC help for verbosity level 3 by kiminuo)
* [#23280](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23280) (init: Coalesce Chainstate loading sequence between {,non-}unittest codepaths by dongcarl)
* [#23202](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23202) (wallet: allow psbtbumpfee to work with txs with external inputs by achow101)
* [#23201](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23201) (wallet: Allow users to specify input weights when funding a transaction by achow101)
* [#23019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23019) (rpc, wallet: Add listaddresses RPC by lsilva01)
* [#22954](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22954) ([TESTS] Allow tx_invalid.json tests to include flag rules for if_unset: [A,B,C] then_unset: [D] by JeremyRubin)
* [#22924](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22924) (refactor: cleanup/followup of Remove -deprecatedrpc=addresses flag by mjdietzx)
* [#22876](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22876) ([TESTS] Update Transaction Tests to permit setting a flag as always on and disabling the exhaustive failure test by JeremyRubin)
* [#22702](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22702) (Add allocator for node based containers by martinus)
* [#22558](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22558) (psbt: Taproot fields for PSBT by achow101)
* [#22019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22019) (wallet: Introduce SelectionResult for encapsulating a coin selection solution by achow101)
* [#22016](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22016) (rpc: add period_start to version bits statistics by Sjors)
* [#21878](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21878) (Make all networking code mockable by vasild)
* [#21702](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21702) (Implement BIP-119 Validation (CheckTemplateVerify) by JeremyRubin)
* [#21283](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21283) (Implement BIP 370 PSBTv2 by achow101)
* [#21206](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21206) (refactor: Make CWalletTx sync state type-safe by ryanofsky)
* [#19888](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19888) (rpc, test: Improve getblockstats for unspendables by fjahr)
* [#17167](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17167) (Allow whitelisting outgoing connections by luke-jr)
* [#16807](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16807) (Let validateaddress locate error in Bech32 address by meshcollider)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
